title: HugsLib
description:
[h1]1.1 modder notice[/h1]
A major update has been released. An update guide with the recommended changes is available: [url=https://github.com/UnlimitedHugs/RimworldHugsLib/wiki/HugsLib-7.0-for-Rimworld-1.1-update-guide]HugsLib 7.0 for Rimworld 1.1[/url]
Clarification on the recent mod conflict issues: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/818773962/1750150007020445333/]Discussion topic[/url]
[h1]end of notice[/h1]

This is a library that provides shared functionality for other mods.
For best results, make sure that HugsLib comes right after Core in your mod load order.

Also includes the Log Publisher: press [b]Ctrl+F12[/b] to upload your Rimworld logs and get a link to easily share them with others.

Can be safely added to existing games.

For more info on what this mod does or to report issues, check out the official forum post: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=28066

The B19 version is still available, and can be found here: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1535869345]HugsLib (B19)[/url]

My other mods: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=761421485]Allow Tool[/url] · [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=761315214]Map Reroll[/url] · [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=761219125]Defensive Positions[/url] · [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=761379469]Remote Tech[/url]
